requirements_ru.recommended: Pentium III 750, 256 Мб памяти, GeForce 3 и выше

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is powered by DOSBox.

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.0 (Cheetah) to 12.6.3 (Big Sur). Does not work on Apple Silicon Macs.
  • Processor: 1 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP
  • Processor: 1 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
